page.title: 15HOME LIFE IN CHINGFORD
page.content: {A Wednesday in my Life { }I wake up at 6:30,I go downstairs and make cereal and a cup of tea.Then I watch television until 7:30.I dress and wash.I clean my teeth with an electric toothbrush.At 8:30 I go to school and knock for Robert and other boys.At school we have assembly then maths then play.At play we play football.Next is English then dinner. After dinner its play then games.Then play again after that its general work.Then Robert and I walk home. I have dinner then watch television then go to bed. Nearly every home has a television and some have videos,telephones , computers and other electrical applia- nces.Many houses have gardens.Most people keep their homes and gardens neatly.
